authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a ticket

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a ticket

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a ticket

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many tickets

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a ticket

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the response only includes the ID. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: properties
options.description:
Used to include specific ticket properties in the results. By default, the results will only include ticket ID and will not include the values for any properties for your company.

Including this parameter will include the data for the specified property in the results. You can include this parameter multiple times to request multiple properties separated by a comma: ,.

. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: propertiesWithHistory
options.description: Works similarly to properties=, but this parameter will include the history for the specified property, instead of just including the current value. Use this parameter when you need the full history of changes to a property's value.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: Unique identifier for a particular contact
contactId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for a particular contact

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: since
options.description: Only return deals created after timestamp x

options.name: includePropertyVersions
options.description: By default, you will only get data for the most recent version of a property in the "versions" data. If you include this parameter, you will get data for all previous versions.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

filterGroupsUi.name: filterGroupsUi

values.name: filtersUi
propertyName
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
Use filters to limit the results to only CRM objects with matching property values. More info here.

filterGroupsUi.description: When multiple filters are provided within a filterGroup, they will be combined using a logical AND operator. When multiple filterGroups are provided, they will be combined using a logical OR operator. The system supports a maximum of three filterGroups with up to three filters each. More info here
filterGroupsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

by.name: by
by.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

companyId.name: companyId
companyId.description: Unique identifier for a particular company
companyId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for a particular company

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: associatedCompanyIds
options.description: Companies associated with the ticket. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: associatedContactIds
options.description: Contact associated with the ticket. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: category
options.description: Main reason customer reached out for help. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: closeDate
options.description: The date the ticket was closed

options.name: createDate
options.description: The date the ticket was created

options.name: description
options.description: Description of the ticket

options.name: pipelineId
options.description: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: priority
options.description: The level of attention needed on the ticket. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: resolution
options.description: The action taken to resolve the ticket. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: source
options.description: Channel where ticket was originally submitted. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: stageId
options.description: The stage ID of the pipeline the ticket is in; depends on Pipeline ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: ticketName
options.description: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in

options.name: ticketOwnerId
options.description: The user from your team that the ticket is assigned to. You can assign additional users to a ticket record by creating a custom HubSpot user property. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

options.name: options
properties
options.description:
Used to include specific company properties in the results. By default, the results will only include company ID and will not include the values for any properties for your company.

Including this parameter will include the data for the specified property in the results. You can include this parameter multiple times to request multiple properties separated by a comma: ,.

. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

domain.name: domain
domain.description: The company's website domain to search for, like n8n.io
domain.ai_hint: The company's website domain to search for, like n8n.io

stage.name: stage
stage.description: The dealstage is required when creating a deal. See the CRM Pipelines API for details on managing pipelines and stages. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stage.ai_hint: The dealstage is required when creating a deal. See the CRM Pipelines API for details on managing pipelines and stages. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.description: Unique identifier for a particular deal
dealId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for a particular deal

type.name: type
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

engagementId.name: engagementId
engagementId.description: Unique identifier for a particular engagement
engagementId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for a particular engagement

formId.name: formId
formId.description: The ID of the form. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
formId.ai_hint: The ID of the form. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

contextUi.name: contextUi

values.name: hutk
values.description: Include this parameter and set it to the hubspotutk cookie value to enable cookie tracking on your submission

values.name: ipAddress
values.description: The IP address of the visitor filling out the form

values.name: pageUri
values.description: The URI of the page the submission happened on

values.name: pageName
values.description: The name or title of the page the submission happened on

values.name: pageId
values.description: The ID of a page created on the HubSpot CMS

values.name: sfdcCampaignId
values.description: If the form is for an account using the HubSpot Salesforce Integration, you can include the ID of a Salesforce campaign to add the contact to the specified campaign

values.name: goToWebinarWebinarKey
values.description: If the form is for an account using the HubSpot GoToWebinar Integration, you can include the ID of a webinar to enroll the contact in that webinar when they submit the form

contextUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

lengalConsentUi.name: lengalConsentUi

values.name: consentToProcess
values.description: Whether or not the visitor checked the Consent to process checkbox

values.name: text
values.description: The text displayed to the visitor for the Consent to process checkbox

values.name: subscriptionTypeId
values.description: The ID of the specific subscription type. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: value
values.description: Whether or not the visitor checked the checkbox for this subscription type

values.name: text
values.description: The text displayed to the visitor for this specific subscription checkbox

values.name: subscriptionTypeId
values.description: The ID of the specific subscription type that this forms indicates interest to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: value
values.description: This must be true when using the 'legitimateInterest' option, as it reflects the consent indicated by the visitor when submitting the form

values.name: legalBasis
values.description: The privacy text displayed to the visitor

values.name: text
values.description: The privacy text displayed to the visitor

lengalConsentUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

pipelineId.name: pipelineId
pipelineId.description: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
pipelineId.ai_hint: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

stageId.name: stageId
stageId.description: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stageId.ai_hint: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

ticketName.name: ticketName
ticketName.description: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in
ticketName.ai_hint: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in

ticketId.name: ticketId
ticketId.description: Unique identifier for a particular ticket
ticketId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for a particular ticket

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'resolveData'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF /resolveData == True THEN SHOW parameter 'properties'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getRecentlyCreatedUpdated' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getRecentlyCreatedUpdated' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getRecentlyCreatedUpdated' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'search' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'filterGroupsUi'
IF operator IN ["HAS_PROPERTY", "NOT_HAS_PROPERTY"] THEN HIDE parameter 'value'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'contactList' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'by'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'add' AND by == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'add' AND by == 'id' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'contactList' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF resource == 'company' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'companyId'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'companyId'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'companyId'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation IN ["getRecentlyCreated", "getRecentlyModified"] THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation IN ["getRecentlyCreated", "getRecentlyModified"] AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'getRecentlyModified' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'searchByDomain' THEN SHOW parameter 'domain'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'searchByDomain' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'searchByDomain' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'searchByDomain' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'stage'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation IN ["getRecentlyCreated", "getRecentlyModified"] THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation IN ["getRecentlyCreated", "getRecentlyModified"] AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation IN ["getRecentlyCreated", "getRecentlyModified"] THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'search' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'filterGroupsUi'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'engagement' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'engagement' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'engagement' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'metadata'
IF resource == 'engagement' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'metadata'
IF resource == 'engagement' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'meeting' THEN SHOW parameter 'metadata'
IF resource == 'engagement' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'call' THEN SHOW parameter 'metadata'
IF resource == 'engagement' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'engagement' AND operation IN ["get", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'engagementId'
IF resource == 'engagement' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'engagement' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'form' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'submit' THEN SHOW parameter 'formId'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'submit' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'submit' THEN SHOW parameter 'contextUi'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'submit' THEN SHOW parameter 'lengalConsentUi'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'getFields' THEN SHOW parameter 'formId'
IF resource == 'ticket' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'pipelineId'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'stageId'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'ticketName'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'ticketId'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'ticketId'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'ticket' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'ticketId'
